item.title: Commands
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

where do you add commands?
I got a command maker with this server, and when i hit generate it gives me this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("imrichbitch")&& playerRights >= 2){               //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("imrichbitch")){                      //Voule Command Generator 
addItem(0995,200000000);
sendMessage("Your Rich Bitch!");
sendMessage("You have left to spend");
}

So where do i put this?

Read full topic
